title: Multiple flaws with floating connection windows
author: farosch
body_snippet:
- [ ] Floating window is always on top of mrng main form
- [ ] Closing a floating window running a RDP session quits the running session but does not close the window itself
- [ ] Resizing a floating window or the main form running a RDP session does not resize the remote desktop
- [ ] Unable to "dock" floating window by dragging and dropping to desktop edges
- [ ] Floating window lacks minimize/maximize buttons
- [ ] Floating windows do not appear on the taskbar or when using Alt+Tab
